entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as having a similar experience to the current situation in their second year. The text states that 'similar happening to Hermione during their second year...'

entities.name: agnes
entities.description: Agnes is introduced as a furry-faced woman who receives Christmas presents from the Healer. She responds with loud barks.

entities.name: broderick
entities.description: Broderick is mentioned as receiving a potted plant and calendar from the Healer, who describes it as 'brightening things up'.

entities.name: healer
entities.description: The Healer is introduced as handing out Christmas presents to Agnes and Broderick. She also mentions that Broderick's son has sent an owl to say he's visiting tonight.

entities.name: mrs longbottom
entities.description: Mrs. Longbottom is mentioned as leaving, with the Healer asking if she's already leaving.

relationships.description: The Healer hands Agnes a small pile of Christmas presents. The text states, 'Here you are, Agnes...'
The Healer hands Broderick a potted plant and calendar. The text states, 'And look, Broderick...'
Agnes receives Christmas presents from the Healer.
Broderick receives a potted plant and calendar from the Healer.
